channel.title: will mods be available on steam (mac)?
channel.description:
hello, i ve just read the news on valvesoftware.com and was amazed by the fact that steam will come to mac. every game developed by valve will be available on mac...but are mods included? especially this half life 1 mod..
thanks for your reply :slight_smile:

item.title: will mods be available on steam (mac)?
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
Gabe must truly hate the PS3 if he puts Mac support before Sony’s black brick, tbh.

item.title: will mods be available on steam (mac)?
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
Franzl:

hello, i ve just read the news on valvesoftware.com and was amazed by the fact that steam will come to mac. every game developed by valve will be available on mac…but are mods included? especially this half life 1 mod…

thanks for your reply

Most mods will work, but in-depth ones that involve a lot of custom scripting, (Such as Black Mesa,) may not.

Read full topic
